text: Fish Tycoon is a casual game created and developed by Last Day of Work. One of the top-selling downloadable games of 2004, 2005, and 2006,Logler.com, "Global Casual Games Top 10 ," logler.com (10-Apr-2006). Fish Tycoon was later ported to cell phone, retail, and Nintendo DS. == Game Storyline == Players take on the role of a fish store owner who must breed and care for hundreds of different kinds of exotic fish, all the while attempting to keep the fish store economically viable long enough to achieve the ultimate objective: breeding The Seven Magic Fish of Isola. The story for this game is that on the mysterious island of Isola there was a lagoon where the most magnificent fish swam. These fish were held together by the 7 magic fish but one day all of the fish have disappeared. Thus, you have to cross-breed fish to rediscover the 7 magic fish, solve the genetic puzzle,Peter Cohen, "Fish Tycoon maker seeks Mac beta testers," Macworld (Mar 21, 2006). and "restore the island to its former glory."James Shiell, "Fish Tycoon review," geekzone (30-AUG-2004). == Magic Fish == Greenfin Spotanus Speckled Leaffish Crimson Comet Oriental Goldbulb Orange Snooper Wasp Grouper Canary Fire-Arrow ==Awards== *Parents' Choice Award 2004 Last Day of Work, "Fish Tycoon News," fishtycoon.com (30-Sep-2004). *iParenting Media Award 2006 Last Day of Work, "Fish Tycoon News," fishtycoon.com (06-May-2006). *Handango Champion Award 2005 Last Day of Work, "Fish Tycoon News," fishtycoon.com (24-Jun-2005). *PocketPC Magazine Best Software Award Nominee edeedxerStar Award 2005 ==References== ==External links== *The Official Website of Fish Tycoon *Fish Tycoon Breeding Guide * Category:2004 video games Category:IOS games Category:MacOS games Category:Majesco Entertainment games Category:Mobile games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Nintendo DS games Category:Palm OS games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Windows Mobile Professional games Category:Business simulation games
title: Fish Tycoon
